ygData.subject: Re: Calm before the storm
ygData.msgSnippet: Aracnia was glad to have Darkmouse back, but she was right about the Aliens. It would be best right now if everyone got into the bunker before the Armada sent

    Aracnia was glad to have Darkmouse back, but she was right about the 
Aliens. It would be best right now if everyone got into the bunker before the 
Armada sent someone or something else. Besides it was begginning to rain and 
thunder.
    "Everyone! Listen! I need to very brave bots to go and find Megatron, 
arrest him, and bring him back here!" She looked into the faces of her 
troops. "He knows vital information about the Aliens, and Im afraid he is 
going to use it agianst ALL of us." She said still holding a smoking 
bowcaster.
    Megatron was the only one to come in contact with the Aliens. He fled and 
was gone from scans. Knowing him, he was probly trying to contact them 
himself. And that wasnt good.
    She continued, "If Im right, then were all in troble. He is sure to cause 
us all great pain. We nedd two of the best warriors. I want Darkmouse to go 
because she has energon flowing within her, and that should sustain her 
through great damage..."
    Aracnia looked longingly at the mouse.

    Megatron was indeed planning on contacting the Aliens, but the noise out 
side, along with the battle, was ruining his plans. For the most part all he 
knew was that a small army had come to destroy his troops, and he lost 2 
already and had a remaining four, including Waspinator.
    Waspinator was nervous, he paced and fluttered here and there. One minute 
he wanted to fight, the next minute he was terrified. Megatron saw this and 
was ready to bash his face in.
    "Get outside now! I want the invaders crushed!" Megatron roared, slamming 
the bug into a few nearby computeres.
    Waspinator sprung up and jetted over to KitKat and covered her in the 
crossfire. Megatron returned to his work.
    Soon, he hoped, he would be in contact with Apollo agian. But this time 
he would be ready. Because this time he held a wepon that would not only 
threaten Apollo, but his whole damned species as well.
